title: Citi Bulgaria Provides Bulgarian Development Bank with 33 Million Euro Credit Facility
summary: Sofia, Bulgaria - Citi Bulgaria provided two new credit lines in the amount of EUR 25 million and EUR 7.7 million to the Bulgarian Development Bank (BDB). The new credit lines are the largest funding Citi has provided to BDB. The facilities will be used for direct investment financing of small and medium enterprises (SME), as well as for trade finance.
tag-1: Citi Bulgaria Provides Bulgarian Development Bank with 33 Million Euro Credit Facility
tag-2: Sofia, Bulgaria – Citi Bulgaria provided two new credit lines in the amount of EUR 25 million and EUR 7.7 million to the Bulgarian Development Bank (BDB). The new credit lines are the largest funding Citi has provided to BDB. The facilities will be used for direct investment financing of small and medium enterprises (SME), as well as for trade finance.
tag-3: "The loan agreements signed today are part of our strategy to attract additional funding under competitive terms. This is possible due to the stable financial position of the bank, the support of the Bulgarian state and the Bank's potential for growth in the future. The competitive terms of the new credit facilities will facilitate the financing of small and medium sized businesses under more favorable parameters," said Assen Yagodin, CEO of BDB.
tag-4: "Citi is delighted to continue our partnership with the Bulgarian Development Bank in the facilitation of funding for Bulgarian SMEs, which helps the growth of local Bulgarian business and the economy, added Stefan Felstein, Citi Country Officer for Bulgaria.
tag-5: The Bulgarian Development Bank is a state-owned financial institution established with the specific purpose to provide long-term financing to Bulgarian SMEs, encourage Bulgarian exports and support projects and sectors of priority importance to the national economy.
tag-6: Citi established a presence in Bulgaria in 1998 by opening a representative office. As of 2000, it is a fully licensed corporate bank branch offering a wide range of corporate and investment services to top-tier local and multinational companies, financial institutions, institutional investors and the government of the Republic of Bulgaria.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
